original_title: Cabinet drops MoP fertilizer price to Rs.9000
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Cabinet has approved to impose a price of Rs. 9,000 for a pack of Muriate of Potash (MoP) fertiliser also known as 'Bundi Pohora'.
Agriculture Minister Mahinda Amaraweera said a pack of Muriate of Potash (MoP) fertiliser was previously sold for over Rs. 19,000/-
